name: Cloudflare
natural_language_description: 这是 Cloudflare 节点。主要用于: Consume Cloudflare API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: zoneCertificate

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: upload
available_options: Get Many (值: getMany) - Get many certificates

zoneId.name: zoneId
zoneId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
zoneId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Zone Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

certificate.name: certificate
certificate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate Content | 作用: The zone's leaf certificate | (必填项)

privateKey.name: privateKey
privateKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Private Key | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 25

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: status (值: None) - Status of the zone's custom SSL

certificateId.name: certificateId
certificateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate ID | (必填项)
